channel.title: How to fix a batch error while trying to put ipconfig
channel.description: ok some people have an error right after they change the classpath and path to java thing. first go to my computer go to system information. click on advanced. click on enviremental variables look at the classpath and path. leave the java thing for the path but for classpath change it to C:\Windows\system32; and there problem solved now u can see ur ips with no trouble and your pc should work better.

item.description:
@saddam_huessin wrote:

ok some people have an error right after they change the classpath and path to java thing.
first go to my computer go to system information. click on advanced. click on enviremental variables look at the classpath and path.
leave the java thing for the path but for classpath change it to C:\Windows\system32; and there problem solved now u can see ur ips with no trouble and your pc should work better.
